extension.news: [B]New[/B][CR]- add standard Kodi 'Menu' key functionality to access side menu in all windows[CR]- add new Wide low info view[CR]- add support for Up Next addon[CR]- add playlist button to video OSD[CR]- add 3D depth information to GUI elements[CR]- add new widget layouts (square and square small)[CR]- add new 2.33:1 scope masking option[CR][CR][B]Improved[/B][CR]- make Wide low view accessible for music views[CR]- make disabled text colour more readable[CR]- improve widget details and window headings[CR]- improve debug overlay[CR]- improve overall handling of music videos[CR]- improve playlist window[CR]- add missing scrollbars[CR]- rework most dialogs for consistency[CR]- improve widget positioning and widget icon size[CR]- improve skinshortcuts management dialog[CR]- improve video info dialog button behaviour[CR]- remove unnecessary song and picture list view[CR][CR][B]Fixed[/B][CR]- fix settings button labels for 21:9 and 4:3 modes[CR]- fix music playlist editor window[CR]- fix side menu return button behaviour[CR]- fix edge alignment of dialogs and windows[CR]- fix watched/listened to status for a play count higher than 1
